wikitext.*:
'''Pelloini''' were most likely the [[fays]] of towns or hedged fields, according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] associated with ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name=Pel>{{PE|14}}, "[[The Creatures of the Earth]]", pp. 7, 10</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Pelloini'' is in [[Qenya]], probably being related to the word ''[[pelle]]'' ("town").<ref name=Pel/> Both ''pelle'' and ''[[pelto]]'' ("hedge, hedged field") are derived from the root [[PELE]] ("fence in").<ref>{{PE|12}}, entry '''PELE''' (1), p. 73</ref>
